author: Sarah Carty
title: First Lady Melania flinches at Donald Trump s touch Yahoo7 Be - Yahoo7
text:
Share First Lady Melania flinches at Donald Trump s touch Yahoo7 Be - Yahoo7 
A video which appears to show Melania Trump visibly recoil at the touch of President Trump has raised concern for her welfare. Close Melania flinches at Donald Trump's touch UP NEXT VIDEO Melania flinches at Donald Trump's touch. Source: Fox News Melania flinches at Donald Trump's touch 
The footage was captured at a Trump rally in Melbourne, Florida, and shows the First Lady reciting the Lord’s prayer, before Trump gets onstage and touches her arm. 
RELATED: Is this the reason Melania Trump's smile disappeared? 
However instead of reacting with warmth at her husband’s show of affection, Melania instead appears to flinch and look downwards. Melania Trump appeared to flinch as her husband touched her arm onstage at a Rally in Florida. Photo: Fox News After the video was posted online, people expressed their concerns for her reaction to her husband's affection. Photo: Fox News 
Her action has raised concern amongst the people of Twitter, who believe Melania shuddered at the touch of Trump. 
"It is likely fear caused by a controlling gesture. However, it COULD be something else. Unexpected touches make me flinch/jump," a user said, after the video was posted online by Twitter user Jess Deck. Trump and Melania met in 1998 and were married in 2005. Photo: Getty 
The video comes after a family member reportedly told US Weekly that Melania is struggling to cope with her role and all the responsibilities that come with it. 
“This life wasn’t her dream. It was Donald’s,”, stylist Phillip Bloch said. 
“Truthfully, it’s a lot to cope with.” Their marriage has come under close scrutiny since Trump became President. Photo: Getty 
Melania also appeared uncomfortable in a video that surfaced from Trump’s inauguration, showing the President turning around to his smiling wife before her face dropped after something he said. 
It’s reported that Melania met millionaire Trump back in 1998, just two years after she had moved from Slovenia to New York. 
The pair were married in 2005 and welcomed their first son, Baron, into the world in 2006. Close Melania forces smile for Donald UP NEXT VIDEO Melania's fake smile at Donald. Source: Yahoo7 Be Melania forces smile for Donald
